document.full_text: alabama on thursday executed by lethal injection a man who went on a shooting rampage that killed four people after a night of drinking alcohol and taking drugs in 1992.
document.title: alabama executes man who killed four in 1992
lines_and_colors: alabama on thursday executed by lethal injection a man who went on a shooting rampage that killed four people after a night of drinking alcohol and taking drugs in 1992.
